title: Weird lag
body:
I was just wondering if anyone else has been experiencing some weird lag lately. It's been happening for the past 2 weeks now, and it's not like the normal lag you get. Every few minutes instead of my ping just shooting up to like 1k+, it would just disconnect, and attempt to reconnect. 
Now I have a friend who's said that he's been getting the same kinda thing, and what i found out was that he was also with iiNet, an internet provider. So I just want to know if anyone else that's with iiNet has been having the same problems.

replies.body: From new zealand I too am experiencing high latency and unplayable lag that have never had before.
Try turning your router off for an hour. I had same problem, same provider, same time (altho idk if you have NBN?). Hasn't happened once since I did that a few days ago. Worth a try anyways, gl.
Yeah, got NBN, about 1 or 2 years ago. But ill try it

I have been experiencing massive lag since around the same time, however I am with Optus not iiNet.

It only seems to be when I play League my internet has a massive allergic reaction and will spike anywhere from 200-1000 ms.

I have done everything I can that involves my home network/my computer to try and fix it but it appears to be external or triggered by something to do with league?
It could be certain internet providers too
yes i do also have iinet I've never had random lag like this before until the 2 weeks ago i have looked into it and still unsure  what coursing it,if i find anything i will post again.
